level.text: Every employer who is subject to any provision of this Chapter shall keep a copy or summary of this Chapter and any applicable postings or literature in a form prescribed or approved by the Department of Employment Services, posted in a conspicuous and accessible place in or about the premises at which any employee covered is employed.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 187 (January 14, 1994).
